abstract: Bulgarian officials, in effort to improve country's image and pave way for acceptance to European Union passport-free travel zone, plan major investigation into high-level corruption.
lead_paragraph: Bulgaria announced plans on Friday to form a special unit to investigate high-level corruption, following a neighbor, Romania, in seeking to shed an image as one of Europe’s most corrupt states.
